player.name: Dennis Rodman
player.physicalDescription: tall 6'7" forward, wiry muscular build, wild multi-colored hair (show as bright red or green), multiple piercings and tattoos visible, dark skin, intense wild eyes, untamed energy
player.archetype: The Wild Card, lived by his own rules, rebounding savant, agent of chaos

figure.name: Esau
figure.attributeDescription: powerful hunting bow, freshly caught wild game slung over shoulder, tools of the wild hunter
figure.visualStyle: wild hunter of the fields, firstborn who sold his birthright
figure.clothing: rough animal skins and furs, minimal clothing of a man who lives outdoors, leather straps and hunting gear
figure.physicalDescription: EXTREMELY HAIRY man covered in red hair all over body and arms (as described in Genesis), wild rugged appearance, powerful hunter's build, ruddy red complexion, fierce untamed eyes, lives by instinct
figure.anatomyNote: two arms only, may carry bow
figure.archetype: The Wild Man, lived for the moment, traded his future for today

connection.thematic: Both were wild, impulsive forces of nature who played by their own rules
connection.narrative: Esau sold his birthright for soup. Rodman sold convention for freedom. Both chose chaos.
connection.relationship: Untamed spirits who couldn't be controlled

interactions.description: Two wild men, hair flowing, ready for anything
Rodman diving for a rebound while Esau hunts - primal instincts in action
